definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: He healed then, so He heals now.
sentences.chinese: 他那时医治了，所以他现在也会医治。

sentences.english: He healed then, so He heals now.
sentences.chinese: 他那时医治了，所以他现在也会医治。

sentences.english: Man I treated a man with two broken legs yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我医治了一位两腿骨折的人。

sentences.english: Moral judgement has no place in the world of remediating disability.
sentences.chinese: 在医治缺陷的世界里道德判断没市场。
时间能医治所有的创伤。

sentences.english: What cure method does solstitial dermatitis have?
sentences.chinese: 夏至皮肤炎有什么医治方法？

sentences.english: But the blind man could not be shamed from doing whatever it took to be healed.
sentences.chinese: 但是他并不羞于做任何可以给他带来医治的任何事情。

sentences.english: Medical treatment failed and the old man went off last night.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人因医治无效于昨晩去世了。

sentences.english: After treatment in patients with open eyes to see, can be bright.
sentences.chinese: 医治后令患者展开眼睛，视物可立刻亮堂。

sentences.english: God despises suffering and wants us to be healed.
sentences.chinese: 上帝看不得人们受苦，总想医治我们。

sentences.english: The disagreement left deep wounds that only time may heal.
sentences.chinese: 意见分歧已留下深深的伤痕，只有时间来医治创伤了。

sentences.english: And know that I had my wounds and also my healing. 3 B.
sentences.chinese: 我的许多创伤，但也有我的医治的法儿。

sentences.english: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
sentences.chinese: 医治爱的创伤惟有更加地去爱。

sentences.english: Three times the Bible recorded the water got healed, all because of God's sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 圣经三次记载水得医治，都是出于神的主权。

sentences.english: Time cures all things. Time heals all wounds.
sentences.chinese: 时间可以医治一切创伤。

definition: to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
variant of 痊癒|痊愈[quan2 yu4]
